issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
It has been requested to add a new feature in the ImageFactory module API for color reduction i.e converting color image to grayscale.

The Filterable Imageview module in the marketplace does this color reduction for the iOS but not for Android. This property needs to be added to both iOS and Android versions of the ImageFactory module.
fields.summary: New Feature to add color reduction functionality to ImageFactory module

comments.body: Now available like discussed in MOD-2333.
